subject: College Athletics
Basketball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: John Calipari also has some returning veterans to help ease the path back to a second straight Final Four as the Wildcats look for the first national championship since 1998.
snippet: John Calipari also has some returning veterans to help ease the path back to a second straight Final Four as the Wildcats look for the first national championship since 1998.
